post:
Hey LET Community, I want to give away this 256MB/320MB Burst VPS from IPXCore. I don't want anything for this VPS, so it's completely free to you assuming you want to continue paying for it. I already asked @Damian and he said it would be fine. Also this VPS is due tomorrow (billing starts on the 7th of each month so you would need to pay it).  

Here are the specs:

<pre>
256MB memory
320MB Burst
10GB storage
300GB/month data transfer @ 100mbit
12 vCPU core
OpenVZ/SolusVM
</pre>

Just @ me if you want it and we'll talk. Thanks LET!

(By the way the VPS is on diamond)
